alternatives.transcript: welcome to islamic bank how may i assist you today i'm looking to expand my agricultural business and heard about your agricultural leasing product can you provide me with specific period in exchange for agreed rental payments does that sound like something you'd be interested in yes it does sound interesting how is it different from a conventional loan that's a good question unlike conventional loans where you borrow money and pay interest re which is not allowed in islam ensures the bank retains ownership of the asset you would pay rent for using it and the rental fee is determined in a transparent agreement that aligns with shi principles i see so i wouldn't own equipment or land outright but i could still use it for my farming operations that's correct however once the determines ends there's an option called mu by tam league leasing that concludes with ownership this allows you to purchase the asset if you wish to that's good to know what kinds of assets can i lease under this program with agricultural leasing you can lease various assets such as tractors irrigation systems harvest greenhouse and even agricultural land the condition is that the asset must be used for halal purposes and comply with shi guidelines that sounds promising what are the main advantages of this program for someone like me there are several benefits yous of first it avoids interest which aligns with islamic values second it provides flexibility since you won't need to pay upfront for expensive equipment third the rental payments are fixed and predictable making budgeting easier finally if you opt for ownership at the end it's an affordable way to eventually acquire the asset that sounds practical what are the eligibility requirements for applying to qualify you'll need to provide proof of your agricultural business such as a business license or farm related documentation will also need your financial records to ensure you can manage the rental payments everything is handled transparent and complies with shi principles got it how is the rental rate calculated the rental rate is based on the assets cost the lease term and market conditions we ensure the rate is fair and mutually agreed upon in the agreement you'll find no hidden charges all details are clearly disclosed front that's reassuring could you explain the process for applying for agriculture leasing it's straightforward first you'll complete an application form and submit the necessary documents such as proof of your business financial statements and identification then our team reviews your application to ensure it meets our shi and credit guidelines once approved we finalize the jar agreement and you can begin using the leased asset how long does it typically take for approval the approval process usually takes around seven to ten business days provided all documents are complete we'll keep you updated throughout to make sure everything goes smoothly that timeline seems reasonable are there any fees involved in setting up the agreement yes there's a small administrative fee for preparing the agreement which covers documentation and processing this fee is disclosed upfront and kept minimal in line with our values of fairness and transparency thanks for explaining what happens if i experience financial difficulties and can't make a rental payment on time if you encounter financial challenges we encourage you to contact us as soon as possible as an islamic bank we focus on understanding and supporting our clients we can explore solutions like restructuring the lease and we don't charge penalties or late fees as these involve re which is prohibited
